content: work 3 single_crochet in each of the sts down the chain starting from the second one then single_crochet 12 to finish the round ee slip_stitch uu page 6 dd gg aa rr tthhee oocctt oo pp s pekjes the piglet you can now start stuffing and continue as you go in the next round we will be crocheting in the unworked blo from r19 and ignoring the tail crocheted in the flo you should have 30 sts before you start r20 20 single_crochet 3 decrease x 6 24 21 single_crochet decrease single_crochet x6 18 22 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 23 decrease x 6 6 fo and weave in the tail ee slip_stitch uu page 7 dd gg aa rr tthhee oocctt oo pp thank you so much for making this pattern you can now make your stack of piglets if you make it please tag me on instagram so that i can see it if you have any questions feel free to reach out instagram @edgar_the_octopus ravelry edgartheoctopus ribblr https //ribblr com/shop/edgar-the- octopus/ email edgartheoctopus@gmail com my logo is a courtesy of @il_gatto_nero_art check out her page ee slip_stitch uu page 8 dd gg aa rr tthhee oocctt oo pp
